sections.purpose: To evenly distribute inoculum over the agar surface using an L-shaped device.
sections.scope: Applicable to spread plate techniques in Microbiology.
procedure: Sterilize the L-shaped spreader by dipping in alcohol and flaming, or by autoclaving.
Allow it to cool before use.
Dispense the inoculum onto the center of the agar plate.
Gently move the spreader across the surface in a circular or back-and-forth motion.
After use, place the spreader back into disinfectant or discard if disposable.
precautions: Ensure the spreader is completely cooled before contacting agar.
Prevent contact with non-sterile surfaces during use.
Handle hot metal spreaders with care to prevent burns.
